name: SF 424 (R&R) Form
condition: This form is required for all grant applications using SF424 (R&R) packages according to these instructions.
user_question: Are you submitting a grant application using the SF424 (R&R) package as described in these instructions?

name: PHS 398 Cover Page Supplement Form
condition: This form is required for all grant applications except for fellowship applications.
user_question: Are you submitting a research grant application (which is not a fellowship)?

name: R&R Other Project Information Form
condition: This form is required for all grant applications.
user_question: Is this a standard NIH/PHS grant application submission covered by these instructions?

name: Project/Performance Site Location(s) Form
condition: This form is required for all grant applications to report the primary and any other locations where the project will be performed.
user_question: Are you submitting a grant application under these instructions (which requires reporting performance sites)?

name: R&R Senior/Key Person Profile (Expanded) Form
condition: This form is required for all grant applications to provide data on the PD/PI and other senior/key persons.
user_question: Does your project involve a Project Director/Principal Investigator (PD/PI) and potentially other senior/key personnel or other significant contributors?

name: PHS Human Subjects and Clinical Trials Information Form
condition: This form is required for all applications, regardless of human subjects involvement, to collect information on human subjects research and/or clinical trials.
user_question: Is this a standard NIH/PHS grant application submission covered by these instructions?

name: R&R Budget Form
condition: This form is generally required for research grants if requesting over $250,000 direct costs per year, for foreign organizations, if using HFT, or if required by the NOFO, and cannot be used with the Modular form.
user_question: For your research grant, does the application request over $250,000 direct costs per year OR involve a foreign organization OR propose using Human Fetal Tissue (HFT) OR is the R&R Budget form specifically required by your NOFO?

name: PHS 398 Modular Budget Form
condition: This form is generally required for domestic research grant applications requesting $250,000 or less direct costs per year, unless exceptions apply or the R&R Budget form is required.
user_question: Is your research grant application from a domestic organization requesting $250,000 or less in direct costs per year, AND are you NOT required to use the R&R Budget form (e.g., not foreign, no HFT, not disallowed by NOFO)?

name: R&R Subaward Budget Attachment(s) Form
condition: This form is required only when using the R&R Budget Form (detailed budget) and the application includes subawards/consortiums performing a substantive portion of the project.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget Form (detailed budget) AND does your research project involve subawards/consortiums performing a substantive part of the work?

name: Subaward R&R Budget Form (Attachment within R&R Subaward Form)
condition: A completed R&R Budget Form from each subaward/consortium organization performing a substantive portion of the project must be attached within the R&R Subaward Budget Attachment(s) Form.
user_question: If using the R&R Subaward Budget Attachment(s) Form, will you need to attach a completed R&R Budget Form PDF from each substantive subawardee?

name: SFLLL (Disclosure of Lobbying Activities) or Other Explanatory Documentation
condition: This attachment (SFLLL is Standard Form LLL) is required if unable to certify compliance regarding lobbying activities or if specifically required by the NOFO.
user_question: Are you unable to certify full compliance with lobbying restrictions OR does your NOFO require the SFLLL form or other explanatory documentation regarding lobbying?

name: Cover Letter Attachment
condition: This attachment is optional but required or recommended for specific situations like late/changed submissions, budgets over $500k direct costs, video intent, large-scale genomic data, or HFT involvement.
user_question: Do any special circumstances apply to your research grant requiring a cover letter (e.g., late/changed submission, budget >$500k direct costs, conference grant, video submission intent, large-scale genomic data, HFT involvement)?

name: Pre-application Attachment
condition: This attachment should only be used if specifically permitted by the NOFO for a pre-application submission type.
user_question: Are you submitting a pre-application AND does the NOFO specifically permit and instruct you to use the 'Pre-application' attachment field?

name: Agency Approval Documentation (within Cover Letter)
condition: Documentation of prior agency approval (e.g., for budgets $500k+ direct costs, Conference Grants R13/U13) must be included, typically within the Cover Letter attachment.
user_question: Does your research grant application require prior agency approval (e.g., budget >$500k direct costs, Conference Grant R13/U13) that needs to be documented in the cover letter?

name: Video
condition: A video submission is allowed only if specified in the NOFO, and intent must be declared in the cover letter.
user_question: Does your NOFO specifically allow video submission AND do you intend to submit one?

name: HFT Compliance Assurance Letter
condition: This signed letter from the PD/PI assuring compliance with informed consent and valuable consideration requirements is required if the project involves Human Fetal Tissue (HFT) from elective abortions.
user_question: Does your proposed research project involve the use of human fetal tissue obtained from elective abortions (HFT)?

name: HFT Sample IRB Consent Form
condition: A blank sample of the IRB-approved consent form used for HFT donation is required if the project involves Human Fetal Tissue (HFT) from elective abortions.
user_question: Does your proposed research project involve the use of human fetal tissue obtained from elective abortions (HFT)?

name: Project Summary/Abstract Attachment
condition: This attachment providing a succinct description of the proposed work is required for all applications.
user_question: Is this a standard NIH/PHS grant application submission covered by these instructions?

name: Project Narrative Attachment
condition: This attachment describing the relevance of the research to public health (max 3 sentences) is required for all applications.
user_question: Is this a standard NIH/PHS grant application submission covered by these instructions?

name: Bibliography & References Cited Attachment
condition: This attachment listing all references cited in the application is required unless otherwise noted in the NOFO.
user_question: Is the Bibliography & References Cited attachment required for your research grant (i.e., not explicitly waived by your NOFO)?

name: Facilities & Other Resources Attachment
condition: This attachment describing the scientific environment and resources is required unless otherwise specified in the NOFO.
user_question: Is the Facilities & Other Resources attachment required for your research grant (i.e., not explicitly waived by your NOFO)?

name: Equipment Attachment
condition: This attachment listing major items of equipment available for the project is required.
user_question: Is this a standard NIH/PHS grant application submission covered by these instructions?

name: Foreign Justification Attachment (within Other Attachments)
condition: This justification is required within 'Other Attachments' if the project involves activities outside the U.S. or partnerships with international collaborators.
user_question: Does your research project involve activities outside of the United States or partnerships with international collaborators?

name: Additional Location(s) Attachment
condition: This attachment is required if you need to list more project/performance sites than the Project/Performance Site Location(s) Form allows.
user_question: Do you have more project/performance sites (primary + others) than the form provides space for?

name: Biographical Sketch (Biosketch)
condition: A biosketch is required for the PD/PI and all individuals identified as senior/key personnel or other significant contributors (OSCs).
user_question: Does your research grant application identify a PD/PI, senior/key personnel, or other significant contributors requiring a biosketch?

name: Current & Pending Support (Other Support)
condition: This information is typically not required at submission unless specified by the NOFO, but will likely be requested Just-in-Time (JIT) before an award.
user_question: Does your NOFO specifically require Current & Pending (Other) Support information at the time of application submission?

name: Additional Senior/Key Person Profile(s) Attachment (Personnel Detail)
condition: This attachment is required if you list more than 100 senior/key persons or OSCs on the R&R Senior/Key Person Profile (Expanded) Form.
user_question: Do you have more than 100 individuals listed as PD/PI, senior/key personnel, or other significant contributors on the R&R Senior/Key Person Profile form?

name: Budget Justification (R&R Budget)
condition: This attachment is required for all applications using the R&R Budget Form to justify costs and provide required details.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget Form (detailed budget) for your research grant?

name: Additional Senior/Key Persons Attachment (R&R Budget Detail)
condition: This attachment is required if requesting funds for more senior/key persons than the R&R Budget form allows space for in Section A.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget form AND requesting funds for more senior/key persons than the form provides lines for in Section A?

name: Additional Equipment Attachment (R&R Budget Detail)
condition: This attachment is required if requesting funds for more equipment items (costing >$5,000) than the R&R Budget form allows space for in Section C.
user_question: Are you using the R&R Budget form AND requesting funds for more equipment items (>$5,000 each) than the form provides lines for in Section C?

name: Personnel Justification (Modular Budget)
condition: This justification attachment is required for all applications using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form.
user_question: Are you using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form for your research grant?

name: Consortium Justification (Modular Budget)
condition: This justification attachment is required if using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form and the project includes consortium/subaward costs.
user_question: Are you using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form AND does your research project involve consortium/subaward costs?

name: Additional Narrative Justification (Modular Budget)
condition: This justification attachment is required if using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form AND there are variations in the number of modules requested annually OR a DMS Plan is required.
user_question: Are you using the PHS 398 Modular Budget Form AND either requesting a different number of modules in different years OR required to submit a Data Management and Sharing Plan?

name: PHS 398 Research Plan Form
condition: This form is used for research applications (and multi-project, SBIR/STTR) to organize research plan attachments.
user_question: Is your application a research grant requiring the PHS 398 Research Plan form?

name: Introduction to Application Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan is required only for Resubmission or Revision applications, or if specified by the NOFO.
user_question: Is your research grant application a Resubmission or Revision, OR does the NOFO specifically require an Introduction attachment?

name: Specific Aims Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan outlining the project aims is required unless otherwise specified in the NOFO.
user_question: Is the Specific Aims attachment required for your research grant (i.e., not explicitly waived by your NOFO)?

name: Research Strategy Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan detailing Significance, Innovation, and Approach is required for applications using this form.
user_question: Are you required to use the PHS 398 Research Plan form for your research grant application?

name: Progress Report Publication List Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan listing publications resulting from the previous funding period is required only for Renewal applications.
user_question: Is your research grant application a Renewal application?

name: Vertebrate Animals Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan is required if live vertebrate animals are used in the project.
user_question: Does your research project involve the use of live vertebrate animals?

name: Select Agent Research Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan is required if the proposed activities involve the use of select agents.
user_question: Does your proposed research involve the use of HHS or USDA select agents?

name: Multiple PD/PI Leadership Plan Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan describing the governance and roles is required if the application designates multiple PD/PIs.
user_question: Are you designating multiple Project Directors / Principal Investigators (PD/PIs) on this research grant application?

name: Consortium/Contractual Arrangements Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment to the Research Plan explaining the arrangements is required if the application includes consortiums/contracts in the budget.
user_question: Does your research grant application budget include costs for consortiums or contractual arrangements?

name: Letters of Support Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment combines all necessary letters demonstrating support from collaborators, consultants, or consortium participants into a single PDF.
user_question: Do you need to include letters of support from collaborators, consultants, or consortium participants for your research grant?

name: Resource Sharing Plan(s) Attachment (Research Plan - Pre Jan 2023 Policy)
condition: This attachment, required for applications developing model organisms or research tools under policies effective before Jan 25, 2023, describes plans for sharing these resources.
user_question: Are you developing model organisms or unique research tools AND submitting under policies effective before January 25, 2023 (check NOFO)?

name: Other Plan(s) - Data Management and Sharing (DMS) Plan (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment, the DMS Plan, is required for all applications generating scientific data submitted under policies effective on or after Jan 25, 2023.
user_question: Will your proposed research generate scientific data AND are you submitting under policies effective on or after January 25, 2023 (check NOFO)?

name: Authentication of Key Biological and/or Chemical Resources Attachment (Research Plan)
condition: This attachment describing methods to ensure identity and validity is required if the proposed science uses key biological and/or chemical resources.
user_question: Does your proposed research use key biological and/or chemical resources (e.g., cell lines, specialty chemicals, antibodies, biologics) that require authentication?

name: Appendix Attachment(s) (Research Plan)
condition: The appendix is optional and strictly limited to blank forms/surveys/questionnaires, blank consent forms, or materials explicitly allowed by the NOFO (max 10 PDFs).
user_question: Do you intend to include allowable appendix materials (blank forms/surveys/consents) or materials specifically required by your NOFO in the appendix?

name: Use of Human Specimens and/or Data Explanation Attachment (HS/CT Form)
condition: This explanation is required if the application involves human specimens/data, but some or all of that use is determined NOT to be human subjects research.
user_question: Does your research involve human specimens or data, AND have you determined that some or all of this use does NOT constitute human subjects research?

name: Other Requested Information Attachment (HS/CT Form)
condition: This attachment should only be included if specifically requested by the NOFO or these instructions (e.g., listing ongoing studies for renewals).
user_question: Does your NOFO or the PHS Human Subjects and Clinical Trials Information form instructions specifically ask you to provide information in the 'Other Requested Information' attachment?

name: Inclusion of Individuals Across the Lifespan Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment is required for each human subjects study record, unless only Exemption 4 applies, to justify inclusion/exclusion based on age.
user_question: Does this specific human subjects study record describe research that is NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Inclusion of Women and Minorities Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment is required for each human subjects study record, unless only Exemption 4 applies, to describe planned distribution and outreach.
user_question: Does this specific human subjects study record describe research that is NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Recruitment and Retention Plan Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment describing recruitment and retention strategies is required for each human subjects study record, unless only Exemption 4 applies.
user_question: Does this specific human subjects study record describe research that is NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4?

name: Study Timeline Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment providing a study timeline description or diagram is required if the study is a clinical trial, and optional otherwise (unless only Exemption 4 applies).
user_question: Is the study described in this specific study record an NIH-defined clinical trial (requiring the Study Timeline attachment)?

name: Inclusion Enrollment Report(s) (IER) (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: At least one IER (planned or cumulative) is required for each human subjects study record, unless only Exemption 4 applies.
user_question: Does this specific human subjects study record describe research that is NOT solely exempt under Exemption 4 (requiring an IER)?

name: Protection of Human Subjects Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment detailing risks, protections, benefits, and knowledge is required for each human subjects study record.
user_question: Does this specific study record describe research involving human subjects (requiring the Protection of Human Subjects attachment)?

name: Data and Safety Monitoring Plan (DSMP) Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment is required if the study is a clinical trial.
user_question: Is the study described in this specific study record an NIH-defined clinical trial (requiring a DSMP)?

name: Overall Structure of the Study Team Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment describing the study team structure is optional unless specifically required by the NOFO.
user_question: Does your NOFO specifically require the 'Overall Structure of the Study Team' attachment for this study?

name: Availability of IP and IND/IDE status Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment describing study agent availability and IND/IDE status is required if the study is a clinical trial using an FDA-regulated intervention.
user_question: Is the study described in this specific study record a clinical trial that will use an FDA-regulated intervention (requiring the IP/IND/IDE status attachment)?

name: Dissemination Plan Attachment (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: This attachment outlining plans for disseminating clinical trial information via ClinicalTrials.gov is required if the study is a clinical trial.
user_question: Is the study described in this specific study record an NIH-defined clinical trial (requiring a Dissemination Plan)?

name: Other Clinical Trial-related Attachments (HS/CT Study Record)
condition: These attachments should only be included if the study is a clinical trial AND the NOFO specifically requests additional trial-related information (max 10 PDFs).
user_question: Is the study described in this specific study record a clinical trial AND does the NOFO specifically request additional clinical trial-related attachments?

name: Justification Attachment (Delayed Onset Study)
condition: This attachment is required for each Delayed Onset Study entry, explaining why details are unavailable and including a dissemination plan if a clinical trial is anticipated.
user_question: Are you including a Delayed Onset Study entry because specific plans for a human subjects study cannot be described yet (requiring a Justification attachment)?

name: PHS Assignment Request Form
condition: This form is optional and used only to communicate assignment/review preferences to NIH referral staff; it is not seen by reviewers.
user_question: Do you wish to communicate specific preferences for the NIH Institute/Center assignment or the Scientific Review Group (Study Section) using the optional PHS Assignment Request Form?
